verses.verse: בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year הָעֲשִׂירִ֔ית <WH6224> In the tenth בָּעֲשִׂרִ֕י <WH6224> in the tenth בִּשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֣ים <WH7760> set פָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> thy face עַל־ <WH5921> against פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> against Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> and prophesy עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> against him and against all Egypt כֻּלָּֽהּ׃ <WH3605> all

דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> Speak וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <WH559> and say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> I am against פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> Behold I [am] against thee Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הַתַּנִּים֙ <WH8577> dragon הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> the great הָרֹבֵ֖ץ <WH7257> that lieth בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst יְאֹרָ֑יו <WH2975> of his rivers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that אָמַ֛ר <WH559> which hath said לִ֥י יְאֹרִ֖י <WH2975> My river וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> myself עֲשִׂיתִֽנִי׃ <WH6213> [is] mine own and I have made

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> But I will put [חַחִיִּים כ] (חַחִים֙ <WH2397> bracelet ק) בִּלְחָיֶ֔יךָ <WH3895> in thy jaws וְהִדְבַּקְתִּ֥י <WH1692> to stick דְגַת־ <WH1710> and I will cause the fish יְאֹרֶ֖יךָ <WH2975> of thy rivers בְּקַשְׂקְשֹׂתֶ֑יךָ <WH7193> unto thy scales וְהַעֲלִיתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH5927> and I will bring thee up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <WH2975> of thy rivers וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all דְּגַ֣ת <WH1710> and all the fish יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <WH2975> of thy rivers בְּקַשְׂקְשֹׂתֶ֖יךָ <WH7193> unto thy scales תִּדְבָּֽק׃ <WH1692> shall stick

וּנְטַשְׁתִּ֣יךָ <WH5203> And I will leave הַמִּדְבָּ֗רָה <WH4057> thee [thrown] into the wilderness אוֹתְךָ֙ <WH853> וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all דְּגַ֣ת <WH1710> thee and all the fish יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <WH2975> of thy rivers עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> upon the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> fields תִּפּ֔וֹל <WH5307> thou shalt fall לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵאָסֵ֖ף <WH622> thou shalt not be brought together וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or תִקָּבֵ֑ץ <WH6908> nor gathered לְחַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> to the beasts הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> of the field וּלְע֥וֹף <WH5775> and to the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of the heaven נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <WH5414> I have given לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> thee for meat

וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> shall know כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> And all the inhabitants מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כִּ֖י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD יַ֧עַן <WH3282> Because הֱיוֹתָ֛ם <WH1961> have been מִשְׁעֶ֥נֶת <WH4938> because they have been a staff קָנֶ֖ה <WH7070> of reed לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

בְּתָפְשָׂ֨ם <WH8610> When they took hold בְּךָ֤ [בַכַּפְךָ כ] (בַכַּף֙ <WH3709> branch ק) תֵּר֔וֹץ <WH7533> thou didst break וּבָקַעְתָּ֥ <WH1234> and rend לָהֶ֖ם כָּל־ <WH3605> all כָּתֵ֑ף <WH3802> all their shoulder וּבְהִֽשָּׁעֲנָ֤ם <WH8172> and when they leaned עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> on תִּשָּׁבֵ֔ר <WH7665> upon thee thou brakest וְהַעֲמַדְתָּ֥ <WH5976> to be at a stand לָהֶ֖ם כָּל־ <WH3605> all מָתְנָֽיִם׃ <WH4975> and madest all their loins ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֛י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> Behold I will bring עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> upon חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> a sword וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> upon thee and cut off מִמֵּ֖ךְ <WH4480> at אָדָ֥ם <WH120> man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and beast

וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> will become אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> And the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt לִשְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> shall be desolate וְחָרְבָּ֔ה <WH2723> and waste וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD יַ֧עַן <WH3282> Because אָמַ֛ר <WH559> because he hath said יְאֹ֥ר <WH2975> The river לִ֖י וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <WH6213> [is] mine and I have made

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> therefore הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> I am against וְאֶל־ <WH413> and against יְאֹרֶ֑יךָ <WH2975> Behold therefore I [am] against thee and against thy rivers וְנָתַתִּ֞י <WH5414> and I will make אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְחָרְבוֹת֙ <WH2723> waste חֹ֣רֶב <WH2721> utterly שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> [and] desolate מִמִּגְדֹּ֥ל <WH4024> from the tower סְוֵנֵ֖ה <WH5482> of Syene וְעַד־ <WH5704> and even גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> even unto the border כּֽוּשׁ׃ <WH3568> of Ethiopia

לֹ֤א <WH3808> will not תַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> shall pass through בָּהּ֙ רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> No foot אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man וְרֶ֥גֶל <WH7272> it nor foot בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> of beast לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not תַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> shall pass through בָּ֑הּ וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and it תֵשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> it neither shall it be inhabited אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> אֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> the land מִצְרַ֨יִם <WH4714> of Egypt שְׁמָמָ֜ה <WH8077> desolate בְּת֣וֹךְ ׀ <WH8432> in the midst אֲרָצ֣וֹת <WH776> of the countries נְשַׁמּ֗וֹת <WH8074> [that are] desolate וְעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5892> and her cities בְּת֨וֹךְ <WH8432> among עָרִ֤ים <WH5892> the cities מָֽחֳרָבוֹת֙ <WH2717> [that are] laid waste תִּֽהְיֶ֣יןָ <WH1961> become שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> shall be desolate אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַהֲפִצֹתִ֤י <WH6327> and I will scatter אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> the Egyptians בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the nations וְֽזֵרִיתִ֖ים <WH2219> and will disperse בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> them through the countries פ

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Yet thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD מִקֵּ֞ץ <WH7093> At the end אַרְבָּעִ֤ים <WH705> of forty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years אֲקַבֵּ֣ץ <WH6908> will I gather אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> the Egyptians מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> from the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they נָפֹ֥צוּ <WH6327> whither they were scattered שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it

וְשַׁבְתִּי֙ <WH7725> And I will bring again אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> the captivity מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֤י <WH7725> and will cause them to return אֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> [into] the land פַּתְר֔וֹס <WH6624> of Pathros עַל־ <WH5921> unto אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> into the land מְכֽוּרָתָ֑ם <WH4351> of their habitation וְהָ֥יוּ <WH1961> become שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there מַמְלָכָ֥ה <WH4467> kingdom שְׁפָלָֽה׃ <WH8217> and they shall be there a base

מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמַּמְלָכוֹת֙ <WH4467> of the kingdoms תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become שְׁפָלָ֔ה <WH8217> It shall be the basest וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will never תִתְנַשֵּׂ֥א <WH5375> neither shall it exalt ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again עַל־ <WH5921> above הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> itself any more above the nations וְהִ֨מְעַטְתִּ֔ים <WH4591> for I will diminish לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> they will not רְד֥וֹת <WH7287> them that they shall no more rule בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> over the nations

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> will never יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become עוֹד֩ <WH5750> again לְבֵ֨ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel לְמִבְטָח֙ <WH4009> And it shall be no more the confidence מַזְכִּ֣יר <WH2142> to remembrance עָוֹ֔ן <WH5771> [their] iniquity בִּפְנוֹתָ֖ם <WH6437> when they shall look אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> after וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> them but they shall know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בְּעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> and twentieth וָשֶׁ֙בַע֙ <WH7651> And it came to pass in the seven שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year בָּֽרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> in the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> [month] in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּ֠בֶל <WH894> of Babylon הֶעֱבִ֨יד <WH5647> to serve אֶת־ <WH853> חֵיל֜וֹ <WH2428> his army עֲבֹדָ֤ה <WH5656> service גְדֹלָה֙ <WH1419> a great אֶל־ <WH413> against צֹ֔ר <WH6865> against Tyrus כָּל־ <WH3605> every רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> every head מֻקְרָ֔ח <WH7139> [was] made bald וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every כָּתֵ֖ף <WH3802> and every shoulder מְרוּטָ֑ה <WH4803> [was] peeled וְ֠שָׂכָר <WH7939> yet had he no wages לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֨יָה <WH1961> had ל֤וֹ וּלְחֵילוֹ֙ <WH2428> nor his army מִצֹּ֔ר <WH6865> for Tyrus עַל־ <WH5921> against הָעֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> for the service אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he עָבַ֥ד <WH5647> that he had served עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold נֹתֵ֛ן <WH5414> Behold I will give לִנְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> unto Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְנָשָׂ֨א <WH5375> and he shall take הֲמֹנָ֜הּ <WH1995> her multitude וְשָׁלַ֤ל <WH7997> and take שְׁלָלָהּ֙ <WH7998> her spoil וּבָזַ֣ז <WH962> and take בִּזָּ֔הּ <WH957> her prey וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become שָׂכָ֖ר <WH7939> and it shall be the wages לְחֵילֽוֹ׃ <WH2426> army

פְּעֻלָּתוֹ֙ <WH6468> [for] his labour אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָ֣בַד <WH5647> wherewith he served בָּ֔הּ נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> I have given ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> him the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> because עָ֣שׂוּ <WH6213> against it because they wrought לִ֔י נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> for me saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he אַצְמִ֤יחַ <WH6779> to bud forth קֶ֙רֶן֙ <WH7161> the horn לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּלְךָ֛ אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and I will give פִּתְחֽוֹן־ <WH6610> thee the opening פֶּ֖ה <WH6310> of the mouth בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> in the midst וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> of them and they shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ
